The rogue becomes so confident in the use of certain skills that she can use them reliably even under adverse conditions. The rogue selects a number of skills equal to her Intelligence modifier. When making a skill check with one of the selected skills (or any of the skills selected through the rogueâ€™s edge class feature), she can take 10 even if stress and distractions would normally prevent her from doing so.

A rogue can gain this special ability multiple times, selecting additional skills for skill mastery to apply to each time.
